column1: '''Amanyar''' ("Those of Aman" in [[Quenya]]) was another name for the [[Calaquendi|Elves of the Light]]
The Vanyar dwelt with the [[Valar]] in their [[Valmar]]
column2: the Noldor in [[Tirion]] (as well as various fortresses and mines in the encircling [[Pelóri]] mountains)
column3: and the Teleri in [[Alqualondë]]. After the [[Third Age]]
column4: those Noldor who had remained in exile in [[Middle-earth]] returned
column5: followed by many of the [[Sindar]] and [[Silvan Elves]]. The Vanyar and Teleri never departed from Valinor save during the [[War of Wrath]].

column1: One Elf of the Light who was not of the Amanyar was King Thingol.<ref>{{S|Thingol}}</ref>
